channel.title: What Song Is This? Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
channel.description: SPOILER ALERT! Hello people. Just wanted to figure out what song this is in Assassin's Creed brotherhood ending. Here's link to the song- [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ztAwMdGsyZw[/url] . It starts at 3:00. It's more ambient rather than an actual song so I don't know if that's why I can't find it. Thanks Btw this is my favorite song out of the series. It gave me the chills.

item.title: What Song Is This? Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: GravityGun
item.description:
It was difficult, but I finally found it - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vIrovVoZsrE

Thanks for the help anyway

Read full topic
item.source: What Song Is This? Assassin's Creed Brotherhood

item.title: What Song Is This? Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Hmm. I’ll never understand why OST albums sometimes won’t include certain songs in it. Nothing short of a LOTR style Complete Recordings edition would cover every single composition in the game.

Dunno if people ever found a way to rip the music files from the game files.

Read full topic
item.source: What Song Is This? Assassin's Creed Brotherhood

item.title: What Song Is This? Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: GravityGun
item.description:
Pyro:

As a rule of thumb, you should be able to find songs like that on Youtube, even if they aren’t on the official OST.

Checked all over youtube and couldn’t find it. Searched it on Google, and could not find it. Posted to 3 different forums and still no answer. I even posted on the official Assassin’s Creed forums -https://forums.ubi.com/showthread.php/747694-What-Song-Is-This-Assassin-s-Creed-Brotherhood?
Nobody replied.
I even contacted Ubisoft (presse@ubisoft.com) and they haven’t replied back yet. I’m just about to give up.

Read full topic
item.source: What Song Is This? Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
